briefTitle: Intraoperative Indocyanine Green Laser Angiography; Postoperative Outcomes for Autologous Tissue Flaps
officialTitle: Intraoperative Indocyanine Green Laser (ICG) Angiography; Evaluation of Postoperative Outcomes for Breast Reconstruction With Autologous Tissue Flaps
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Eligible patients over the age of 18 years
* Deemed suitable for breast reconstruction with the latissimus dorsi (LD) myocutaneous flap, muscle sparring LD flap or transverse rectus abdominal muscle (TRAM) flap

Exclusion Criteria:

* Patients with recurrence of breast cancer
* Smoking 4 weeks prior of operation
* Not able to read and understand Danish
